title: MERN Appwrite Blogging Platform
features: Designed and implemented a secure, scalable MERN architecture integrated with Appwrite, enabling real‑time authentication and CRUD operations for a multi‑author blogging platform.
Developed reusable React components (AuthLayout, PostCard, Button) and a modular CSS framework, reducing code duplication by 40% and improving UI consistency across devices.
Leveraged Node/Express middleware and Appwrite SDK to enforce role‑based access control, achieving a 99.9% uptime and reducing server errors by 30% during peak traffic.
